profile.name: Waldo Miguel Panozo
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer
profile.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 15+ years designing high-impact solutions with PHP, Java, JavaScript, and REST services. I love driving measurable results through clean architecture, modern frameworks, and collaborative leadership—whether remotely or on-site.

about.bio: I'm Waldo M. Panozo, a Senior Software Engineer with 15+ years of experience designing and scaling products with PHP, Java, JavaScript, and modern REST architectures.

achievements.title: Vehicle Search Launch
achievements.description: Led the delivery of a multi-tenant vehicle search experience highlighted at SEMA 2025.

achievements.title: +70% Productivity
achievements.description: Built an agile orchestration platform that increased productivity by at least 70%.

achievements.title: Hackathon Wins
achievements.description: Two-time Revolution Parts hackathon winner for caching and AI initiatives.

achievements.title: 80K+ Users Served
achievements.description: Delivered biometric control and scholarship platforms supporting 80K+ users.

roles.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Launched a new multi-tenant vehicle search experience showcased at SEMA 2025.
Improved GMV conversions by 13.7% through SEO and analytics instrumentation.
Won company hackathon twice by delivering caching optimizations and AI tooling.

roles.title: Tech Lead
highlights: Onboarded new team members and restructured the GMV squad until leadership hire.
Coordinated sprint rituals, PR reviews, and cross-team HLD to align delivery.

roles.title: Software Development Lead
highlights: Boosted productivity by 70% via a digital workflow platform.
Designed provider administration portals reducing request time from 15 to 5 days.
Led scholarship services serving 15K+ students annually.

roles.title: Senior Software Developer
highlights: Implemented biometric-enabled support control for 80K+ users.
Created dynamic survey platform mixing SQL and NoSQL storage.
Built the university’s first API enabling 20M+ yearly transactions.

roles.title: Senior Software Engineer (Contractor)
highlights: Created a call recording platform combining hardware and software.
Built a real-estate catalog with recommendation engine driven by engagement.

roles.title: IT Manager
highlights: Reduced communication and operations expenses by 70% using VoIP and broadband upgrades.

roles.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Maintained corporate website with lead workflows.
Developed an SMS marketing platform with reusable templates.

roles.title: Principal Software Engineer
highlights: Developed the primary ordering site with automated notifications for restaurant managers.

roles.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Built CuisineLinks, a social recipe-sharing platform with guided publishing flows.

roles.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed a DOLE field-tracking platform monitoring ISO compliance.
